audioText: Tu acceptes facilement les critiques constructives de tes collègues même quand elles remettent en question tes méthodes habituelles.
question: How does the person react to constructive criticism?
options: Accepts it easily even when it questions usual methods
Gets defensive and argues against suggestions
Only accepts criticism from certain people
Pretends to listen but ignores the advice
explanation: The text states 'Tu acceptes facilement les critiques constructives de tes collègues même quand elles remettent en question tes méthodes habituelles.' - You easily accept constructive criticism from your colleagues even when it questions your usual methods. 'Acceptes' is the second person singular present form of 'accepter' (to accept).
